CIRCUIT COURT OF
TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
ALEXANDER CITY DIVISION
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR )
)
PLAINTIFF/FATHER )
)
v. ) CASE NO. DR-2023-900051.01
)
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND )
)
DEFENDANT )
JOINT MOTION TO CONTINUE
COMES now the Plaintiff/Father, Christopher Blaine McGregor, by and through his attorney
of record, Dianne James Davis, and Defendant, Brittany Michelle Gilliland, by and through her
attorney of record, Barbara Agricola states the following facts:
1. That the Final Hearing in this matter was continued until October 30, 2025.
2. That two witnesses for the Plaintiff, Kelly Turner, and the Defendant’s husband Bradley
Cleckler, cannot appear on October 30, 2025, as stated in the Motion filed October 21,
2025.
3. That Kelly Turner was properly served on October 20, 2025, with a subpoena, and her
email dated October 20, 2025, was attached to the Motion filed on October 21, 2021, that
she is not available for court on this date (10-30-2025) as she will be out of town.
4. That this Court has graciously sent his available dates for November 18, 2025, and
Barbara Agricola had a conflict. The Court then sent available dates of December 3 or 4,
2025, Barbara Agricola was available only on December 4th, however, Dianne Davis has
a trial set in Lee County that was set by Order entered on April 25, 2025, Salatto v Salatto
43-CV-2023-900236, and she is not available on December 4, 2025.
5. That both attorney’s believing the case was going to be set on another date have
scheduled other matters for October 30, 2025.
WHEREFORE, the premises considered, the Plaintiff and Defendant request the Court
DOCUMENT 397
set a Zoom hearing as soon as possible in order to set a date for trial and that the Court further
compel ALL WITNESSES to appear.
Respectfully submitted this the 29th day of October, 2025.
/s/Dianne James Davis /s/Barbara H. Agricola
Dianne James Davis (DAV007) Barbara H. Agricola (AGR004)
Attorney for Plaintiff/Father Attorney for the Defendant/Mother
107 Main Street 127 South 8th Street
Alexander City, Alabama 35010 Opelika, AL 36801
(256) 392-3172 (334) 759-7557
